content: Hey, I am not feeling super great this week, so please don’t block PRs on me :-)
Hi! I will be unavailable until the end of this week. I have open pull request https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/9944 I will not be able to communicate/act on it for that time.

I think I'm out for some substantial time due to many tangled reasons, good and bad.

I do want, hope and hopefully will get back, might be even occasionally participate with emojis, small comments and fixes, but nothing good before year 2022, I'm afraid.

Thank you all.

Just as a heads up, my desktop computer decided to break again yesterday with the same problem I had a few months ago, so I won't be able to work on things for a week or two until I hopefully get things running again.
Do you have laptop? That might be a fun opportunity to explore codespaces, vscode remote and other "code in the cloud" options
To be clear, that's just in cases you didn't thought about it before and want to mess around with the joyful world of distributed computing, you don't have to work on things :-)
I do have a laptop so I could try playing around with that, but I can probably also enjoy taking a break from things for a bit as well :big_smile:
Codespaces can't run anything, it has no compute
Codespaces is different from the one where you hit ..
